name: Cross Server Chat
description: When used on multiple servers, this plugin relays chat to other connected servers.
author: x

hosting.description: Whether or not the server running this plugin should be the one hosting the chat server.

ip.description: The IP that is running the chat server. If `hosting` is true, it is the hostname. If false, it is the IP to connect to.

port.description: The port to host/connect to the chat server. Important whether hosting or not.

name.description: The display name of the game server that will be sent to connected chat servers.

color.description: Hex code of the color important messages will display in. Also the color that will be shown to other servers.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to messages to other servers. Don't include any trailing whitespace.

reconnect-authorized.description: A comma-separated list of usernames allowed to use !chat:reconnect.

reconnect-interval.description: How often, in seconds, the plugin should try to reconnect to the host server if the connection is lost.
